triples.name: Language model
triples.relevance: The paper proposes BERTurk, a new language model specifically designed and trained for Turkish language processing.

triples.name: BERT (language model)
triples.relevance: BERTurk is built upon the BERT transformer architecture for natural language processing in Turkish.

triples.name: Turkish language
triples.relevance: The paper develops BERT models specifically optimized for Turkish language processing.

triples.name: Hugging Face
triples.relevance: Hugging Face model hub is the platform used to distribute the BERTurk models to the research community.

triples.name: TensorFlow
triples.relevance: TensorBoard (part of TensorFlow) is used for monitoring and visualizing model training metrics.
